body_html:
@petewarden I added all the *.cc files in tensorflow/contrib/quantization/ops and tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels to tf_op_files.txt and then run tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_ios.sh but got the following error:

In file included from tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels/dequantize_op.cc:20:
./tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels/quantization_utils.h:28:10: fatal error: 'public/gemmlowp.h' file not found
#include "public/gemmlowp.h"
         ^

I then changed the Makefile by adding the path to gemmlowp to HOST_INCLUDES:

HOST_INCLUDES := \
-I. \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/ \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/eigen-eigen-$(EIGEN_VERSION) \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \
-I$(HOST_GENDIR)

but I got the same compile error. I do have all the files of gemmlowp downloaded in the tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/gemmlowp/ directory.

body:
@petewarden I added all the *.cc files in tensorflow/contrib/quantization/ops and tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels to tf_op_files.txt and then run `tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_ios.sh` but got the following error:

```
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels/dequantize_op.cc:20:
./tensorflow/contrib/quantization/kernels/quantization_utils.h:28:10: fatal error: 'public/gemmlowp.h' file not found
#include "public/gemmlowp.h"
         ^
```

I then changed the Makefile by adding the path to gemmlowp to HOST_INCLUDES:

```
HOST_INCLUDES := \
-I. \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/ \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/eigen-eigen-$(EIGEN_VERSION) \
-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp \
-I$(HOST_GENDIR)
```

but I got the same compile error. I do have all the files of gemmlowp downloaded in the tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/gemmlowp/ directory.
